content: *stop cold air in its tracks this draft dodger keeps cold air from leaking under doors lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 90693ad skill level easy level 2 vanna s choice® article #860 7 colors 1 ball each crochet hook - size g-6 4 mm plastic stuffing pellets fiberfill stuffing split ring stitch markers large-eye blunt needle worked in color stripes of single_crochet u s in rounds to form a tube stuff the tube with alternating amounts of pellets and fiberfill and crochet closed see also draft stopper #60492a 1 knit 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/draft-stopper-60492a
